items: Write for loops and while loops

sections.heading: Why do we need loops?
paragraphs: Loops let us run the same block of code multiple times without rewriting it.

sections.heading: Warning about infinite loops
paragraphs: If the condition never becomes False, the loop runs forever!

sections.heading: Hands-on practice
bullets: Write a for loop that prints numbers 1 through 10.
Write a while loop that counts down from 5 to 1.
Loop through a list of your favorite foods and print each one.
for loops → best when you know how many times you’ll loop
while loops → best when you loop until a condition changes

questions.prompt: Which loop is best for repeating something a set number of times?
What happens if a while loop condition never becomes False?
What does the following code print? for i in range(3): print("Hi")
